name: Conflict on Mars
description:
This game is a straightforward RTS level with prerendered sprites like many RTS games from the late 90s.

You can build two buildings: Power Generators that generate energy, the resource to build units and buildings, and Bio Domes to get a higher population cap. You can only train one type of infantry unit at your base.

The goal is to destroy the alien spaceship on the map.

The included build is a standard Unity project compiled for the Intel 64-bit architecture for Windows. A WebGL version might be uploaded in the future.
